title: My Update bar keeps rising but its still stuck on the number 33? When its "Done" it shows a error.
body: When its done it just says "Update failed, Please check the logs"

replies.body:
Getting stuck at 33% while patching is typically an indication that your patcher cannot establish a stable connection to the patching service. To troubleshoot this, I recommend taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which covers the most common solutions for this issue. 

Let me know if you were able to resolve this issue with those steps.
